title: Stock Futures Edge Up Ahead of Fed Decision
sub_head: The Federal Reserve will release a policy statement at 2 p.m. ET and Chairman Jerome Powell will hold a press conference at 2:30 p.m. ET
body:
U.S. stock futures edged higher, with the Federal Reserve poised to raise its benchmark interest rate Wednesday.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.3% Wednesday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 rose 0.2% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged up 0.2%. U.S. stock indexes finished modestly higher on Tuesday.
